fileupload.title: Upload file for simulation
fileupload.productionPlanning: Production Planning for the following 4 periods
fileupload.chooseResult: Choose your results of the last period

simulation.errorMissingInput: Please only enter digits and do not leave your inputs empty.
simulation.inputInvalid: Please enter a number and do not leave the fields empty.
simulation.selectSplit: Select if production should split orders
simulation.tooltipProductionPlanning:
Here You can plan your production for the next four periods..
All given values derive from given forecasts.
 Please only enter Numbers and don't leave the input fields empty.
Splitting means the breakdown of production orders, to improve the production programm.
simulation.tooltipProductionProgram: Here You can overview the calculated production program. Please only enter Numbers and don't leave the input fields empty.
simulation.tooltipDeliveryProgram: Here you can overview the calculated order program. Please only enter Numbers and don't leave the input fields empty.
simulation.tooltipWorkhours: Here you can overview the calculated shifts and overtimes. Please only enter Numbers and don't leave the input fields empty.
simulation.tooltipOverview: Here you can overview the full period's planning. Press 'Generate XML File', to generate a file with for that period.
simulation.tooltipDirectSelling: Here you can plan your direct sells. Please keep in mind to only enter numbers as values.
